website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you want a tea that is formulated for soothing stress relief and you enjoy a combination of herbs and sweetness.
pros: A good choice for sipping while unwinding and relaxing, as it has a delicious herbal blend that includes lemon balm, chamomile, lavender, passion flower, and honey
cons: The flavor isn't for everyone – some consumers found it too light, while others found it overpowering
A few who tried it griped because the blend includes mint

customer_reviews.title: Not a stress miracle, but I’ll take what I can get!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea! It may not cure all my stress, or make my toddlers stop making me lose my mind, but it certainly is nice to sip while I watch them argue over th same toy for the 47th day in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Erin N

customer_reviews.title: my go-to 5:00 tea
customer_reviews.text: Delish and great for afternoons. Helps me from drinking too much wine
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: A good bedtime tea
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of picky about tea (as in there's a lot I don't like) but this is really good. It's also good for it's proposed Stress Relief. I suffer from insomnia and this helps me get ready for bed.
customer_reviews.author: theworldofdale

customer_reviews.title: Usually lavender has a soapy/lotion taste (hope that makes sense) but the flavor in these teas are present yet mild and sweet. These also helped me when I had vertigo
customer_reviews.text: This helps to calm me down when I'm trying to wind down at night or if I'm having a stressful day at work. Usually lavender has a soapy/lotion taste (hope that makes sense) but the flavor in these teas are present yet mild and sweet. These also helped me when I had vertigo.
customer_reviews.author: hollypenyo

customer_reviews.title: Not the yogi I'm used to from my grocery - BLAND
customer_reviews.text: After falling in love with this tea and it's perfectly blended flavors, I opted to buy on here to save myself the trip to a store that I don't frequent often. I'm not sure why or how, but this tea tastes nothing like what I get in my local supermarket. Horribly bland and completely lacking that lavender flavor I've grown to love. I'm so sorry I bought 3 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed drinking it in the morning before a stressful day
customer_reviews.text: This was a really yummy tea. I enjoyed drinking it in the morning before a stressful day, or as relaxing cup in the evening after a busy day. The flavor is fantastic with just a teaspoon of honey added, and it was bliss from there! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: AWJ

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Don't drink and drive! Plz
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. No sweetener added, I love this tea. The first time I drank a cup, after about an half an hour later I kinda began swaying while standing, while checking the news and talking to my mom. Each time since, about the same time span, I get REAL ZZZLEEP. I can't imagine drinking this tea or anyone else and then driving or operating machinery. It's for the stress relief at the end of the day and yes I agree. Very helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I found this tea by accident, and I’ve fallen in love with it! It’s great to drink at night, it smells wonderful, and The taste is sweet and mild. I had to order it on Amazon because my local grocery stores didn’t carry it, but it shipped really quickly. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Truluck

customer_reviews.title: One of my Top 5 Teas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular box of tea for a friend for Nurse Week, and she was not disappointed! I sent it to her because I know her job is very stressful, especially now. This tea helps me calm down after I have a hard day, and it helped my friend, too. Such a calming and aromatic mixture, and the flavor is absolutely perfect. Everyone should drink this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Palma Janelle Nardozza

customer_reviews.title: Mild flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite tea, but not my least favorite either. It does have a VERY mild taste. (To get the most flavor pour boiling water over the tea bag, cover the cup, let it steep until cooled, then reheat it in the microwave with the bag and cover.) I didn't find that this tea helped me relax at all.
customer_reviews.author: Annie48

customer_reviews.title: Honey Taste is Off
customer_reviews.text: I love green tea and particularly the Yogi brand so I thought I would give this a try. Let's just say it is fine but not my favorite cup of tea. The honey taste seems a little overpowering and artificial like. I am glad I only bought one box because I likely wouldn't drink this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Honey Lavender - Eases Stress - REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: If you need instant stress relief, this tea is amazing (Honey Lavender). It does not make me sleepy, but instantly helps calm nerves. LOVE THIS STUFF! Gave some to a co-worker, she also loves. :)
customer_reviews.author: ILMLover

customer_reviews.title: So calming, much soothing. Thank God.
customer_reviews.text: So calming, much soothing. Thank God. I have a ... somewhat stressful job. I therefore live off this at time. With a bit of milk and a few spoonfuls of sugar this is legitimately feels like getting a hug from the inside. Which is great - not least because it means I'm able to ignore folks tap dancing on my last nerve. Also, since it's an add-on I'm able to toss this into my frequent Amazon orders.
customer_reviews.author: Naut Gonnya

customer_reviews.title: Note to Self: Never Buy Tea Online ... Just go to the store
customer_reviews.text: After finishing off my seemingly life time supply of lemon tea, I finally decided to open my honey lavender tea ... only to find this. Only 2 packets are honey lavender flavor while the rest is rose hibiscus ... Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Child

customer_reviews.title: This tea is super tasty. It's very different from most other teas
customer_reviews.text: This tea is super tasty. It's very different from most other teas, which is good. I can't say that the herbs have really made much difference on on calming me down, but it definitely helps get me in the right mood for sleeping, and it's nice to have a hot beverage a bit before going to sleep that doesn't keep you awake.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: Must have after a stressful day
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I both work stressful jobs and we were talking about healthy coping mechanisms we use and we both said we drank a good cup of tea during or after a bad day. Then we recommended our favorite tea to each other and we both drank this! There are so many tea brands and varieties out there and we've tried many, but this one is easily accessible, reasonably priced, and helps soothe the nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: The stress relief Honey Lavender tea : what I like the most about this tea is, the fact that I would leave the tea bag in my tea cup the whole time that I was drinking the tea and no bitter taste, the flavor is enhanced Instead. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur White

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells and tastes delicious and refreshing. I drink it before bed and it is so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually enjoy tea. I'm almost exclusively a coffee drinker
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning, I don't usually enjoy tea. I'm almost exclusively a coffee drinker. This is fantastic though. The flavor is delightful. I drink it when I'm trying to relax---I don't know if there really is anything to the stress relief part of it but it seems to help me. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I’m doing this wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great.. However, it feels like total lunacy when I’m stressing out trying to drink a cup of tea to calm down. It feels futile. But it is a very nice tea and maybe it would be more effective if I drank it before walking into a stressful situation vs after. I will keep drinking it with a wry chuckle.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieL

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This delicious tea really does work. I suffer from some anxiety disorders and take meds for that but still have breakthrough anxiety quite often. I have a cup of this tea and in a short while I notice that I feel much better. I always think things like thins have what it is supposed to do in it's name, but never actually work. But this one does. It smells and tastes wonderful. Each tea bag tag has a little saying on it which is really sweet. Each tea bag is in a separately sealed packet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The Tea's Great, but the container and the shipping box were dented.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend the tea, but I'd also recommend buying it through a private or local seller. It just doesn't have the physical stamina to withstand the riggers of life in the warehouses. It's only human, after all...
customer_reviews.author: JustRosy

customer_reviews.title: Basically my favorite thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This tea is my jam in a deep delicious way. There's no way to do justice to the flavor but it makes my day every time. Sweet but not too sweet, floral without being overwhelming, and warm.
customer_reviews.author: GorgeousGuerilla

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor good choice
customer_reviews.text: This tea is delicious and I don't know if it has an effect on my stress ,but , I definitely am enjoying the fragrant aroma. It has a mild pleasant taste. I only added a teaspoon of honey after tasting it alone. This is just a personal preference. It taste fine alone.this was a good buy, I will be definitely reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this tea brand! I like this honey lavender, but the best tasting flavor to me is their bedtime tea. I make pitchers of Yogi tea mixed with plain green tea (cheaper brands) and drink it all day- you can also buy Yogi tea at HEB, although the flavors are limited.
customer_reviews.author: Texas mom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flavor but not much tea in each bag.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely flavor but not much tea. It helps if you bring the water to a full boil, and if you are brewing more than 6 ounces, use two teabags. So instead of the 16 teabags, you're really getting the equivalent of 8. That said, lovely flavor.
customer_reviews.author: User425

customer_reviews.title: I like the flavor of this tea but I haven't noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of this tea but I haven't noticed the stress relief I had hoped. Still, a great tea with great flavor. Nice way to end your evening.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Tammen

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I used this product almost daily, especially during the week. I work full time and am currently working on a 2nd Masters degree, therefore, stress rears its ugly head quite a bit in my life right now. This tea does seem to help calm me down when I am feeling stressed. The taste is also better than I expected, which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good, soothing tea
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and the smell when it's steeping. I'd buy this tea again; lives up to "yogi"s standards!
customer_reviews.author: Honmom

customer_reviews.title: Most Popular Drink Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I put this out at a daylong workshop .... and those teabags were gone first! It has a unique taste, but people like it. And seriously, if purchasing for a workroom, shared space, or workshop - get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Net2018

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soothing anxious feelings!
customer_reviews.text: This tea is AMAZING. It tastes like relaxation, and I love how the lavender has helped me to really calm down when my anxiety gets really bad. I'm so glad I purchased this tea! I shared some with one of my coworkers, and he was raving about it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and light
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, light, and relaxing.... I like to pop in an organic green tea bag for the caffeine when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Marci (Soul of the Single Lady)

customer_reviews.title: In general this flavor of tea is awesome. I might have gotten a stale box is ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this box of tea doesn't have the same flavor as my first few packets. Maybe I didn't get a fresh one. Not bothersome enough to do anything about it though. In general this flavor of tea is awesome. I might have gotten a stale box is all.
customer_reviews.author: pink7

customer_reviews.title: This tea is so lovely.
customer_reviews.text: AW YEAH. This tea is so lovely. I could buy it for the aroma alone. Breathing in the smell of the bag while my water is heating and inhaling the steam while it's steeping is just as nice of an experience as actually drinking it. This is a very pleasing tea.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: It’s so good, you don’t need sweetener !
customer_reviews.text: I drink this every night before bed. It’s so delicious you don’t need sweetener! Perfect way to to unwind at night.
customer_reviews.author: Pete W

customer_reviews.title: Drink and de-stress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a co-worker gave me one to try. New favorite tea. It is not overly floral which is nice with the lavender. Drink and de-stress.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for tea on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: for $3 and 16 bags, this is a steal! As far as quality and taste, I hope you like Lavender because this is a mouthful of it. Personally I do and so this was my go to tea before bed. If you're feeling adventurous or need a caffeine boost, try making this with a bag of earl grey as well and man oh man that is a fantastic cup of tea (plan your water accordingly because it'll be STRONG!!)
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yogi is the besssst tea ever. It tastes good and helps control my stress levels and anxiety. Students would know what I am talking about :). My friend drives from a city 1 hour away just to drink this tea and says it tastes wonderful. I am very satisfied and would recommend this tea.
customer_reviews.author: shey007

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Steep 5-8 minutes & you can really taste the honey! The lavender is more prominent steeped at less time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cloud

customer_reviews.title: I got it for the stress relief claim. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the stress relief claim. My sister-in-law thinks it really helps her sleep. It does nothing for me. Flavor is okay, so you are getting 2 reviews in one, here. I would give is 3.5 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Leda Buller

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Aroma
customer_reviews.text: Yogi Honey Lavender Tea taste great! I now have a new Lavender obsession. I never thought you could actually drink or eat Lavender. It sure does help me relax better before bedtime and it has a lovely aroma. 5 stars for this stress relieving tea!
customer_reviews.author: Britney C.

customer_reviews.title: This tastes Soooooo good. Not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!! I was looking for a soothing tea to drink at night after a long hectic day. Sleepytime just wasn't doing it for me anymore! This tastes Soooooo good. Not too sweet, very relaxing and you can feel the stress melt away.
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Really not sure why I bought stress TI don't think it's something you can necessarily tell that works but the flavors fine and Yogi teas have always seemed to me to be
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really like this tea
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tea! Very calming and has a wonderful taste and aroma. Helps me to relax at night and go to sleep peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste. I couldn’t even drink one cup of this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Distorted packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed— I purchased this as a gift, couldn’t possibly gift it looking like this.
customer_reviews.author: TPadilla

customer_reviews.title: This tea is amazing. Always have it at home
customer_reviews.text: This tea is amazing. Always have it at home. Sometimes it helps me to relieve a headache after a stressful day at work. Taste is also great, I like it plain with no sweetener added but I actually never add sweetener to any tea. Will definitely continue buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Iryna C

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I have an entire cabinet that is full of tea but this is one of them that actually gets in my cup regularly. It has such a wonderful taste and it really does calm me down after I get frazzled.
customer_reviews.author: 9lej123

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely tea
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely tasting tea. I'm not sure if it is the ingredients, the taste, or the warmth that creates a wonderful, cozy, relaxing feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Gram Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tea is calming
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the only tea that relaxes me. I've tried all the others (camomile, valerian, kava, linden flower, passion flower...). And it's a pleasant flavor, not too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Best flavor of tea I have tried recently. Calming, soothing, comforting, and you can taste the honey, so there is no need to add any sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Lavender is second to last on the list. Very ...
customer_reviews.text: Lavender is second to last on the list. Very misleading. Actually a hodgepodge of mint and other herbs, but you taste the mint really strongly, Don't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stress Relief Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea for my sister. She loves all kinds of teas and she says the Yogi brand is great. She said this specific flavor was great for after work to detox and stress relief.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chen

customer_reviews.title: Tolerable
customer_reviews.text: Taste is tolerable, doesn’t smell bad, decent ingredients, doesn’t upset my stomach, & each bag has a sweet, little quote attached.
customer_reviews.author: Yega

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed the taste of this tea
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the taste of this tea. However, it's more lavender than honey lavender. It didn't bother me, but be aware. There is also added dextrose, so no need to add any sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: J Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a coffee over tea person, but this tea tastes SO GOOD! No sweetener needed. I'm not sure how much it helps with stress, but the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Ahh....Lavender....
customer_reviews.text: Love lavender teas. This was my first purchase of the Yogi brand honey lavender tea. Excellent taste, and a great way to relieve stress, relax, and unwind. Especially before bed. Tea arrived quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and soothing, the lavender is not tasting like a harsh chemical (which has been the case for me with some other brands of this tea flavor) and each bag can be used twice (for two cups).
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is harder and harder to find in the stores, but it's a great tea. Wonderful lavender honey taste, strong combo of rooibos and chamomile is relaxing and also really helps you sleep. I highly recommend it. Two cups and you're out, though -- I wouldn't recommend it during the day or at work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan!

customer_reviews.title: Chill out without the grogginess
customer_reviews.text: What isn't to love about Yogi teas? This one in particular has a very nice flavor and soothing effect. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: jim odellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Felt calm..
customer_reviews.text: This was a very calming tea. It smelled and tasted great. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tea. It tastes great and does not need any sweetener. Great cup of tea for a relaxing afternoon or evening.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: no taste at all
customer_reviews.text: I've hardly ever met a tea I didn't like. And I love Yogi teas. This has no flavor, none, zip. I added two bags and a faint dishwater taste came through. Then I added honey. nope. I'm so disappointed but not worth the carbon footprint to return two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Lida Do

customer_reviews.title: Good lavender tea
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and is very smooth. It is very soothing and helps you relax. I would also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love yogi teas but it’s not my favorite flavor, prefer the kava One
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best relaxing tea. The flavors are perfect and not too strong or light. My favorite for finals stress
customer_reviews.author: Bbunny

customer_reviews.title: My favorite caffeine free variety
customer_reviews.text: Love this one, soft and not overpowering with any particular flavor. Very relaxing and good for bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Helps the stress
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my daughter but my granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the box was crushed (I expect better of Amazon), but the tea is great and I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this tea for years and I love it. I like the flavors and it works for me. I drink it when I am stressed or before a test and it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lakishia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Honey soothing, calming tea
customer_reviews.text: Smooth honey and calming lavender without any caffeine - love to drink this tea after a stressful day to relax in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: K.Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I drink this a lot. I don't know if it relaxes me, but I guess just the act of drinking tea will do that! Very pleasant and mild.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Happy loves ones
customer_reviews.text: The is a wonderful tea that is use to help my mother relax as I have said in other reviews my mother suffer from dementia and these teas are a natural way to help her to sleep and relax and we use other tea for other help issues associated with the dementia.
customer_reviews.author: J Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Lavender blend, but good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more lavender in the initial aroma, but it is very pleasing and relaxing. A little lemon gives it a boost of flavor, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Castillo

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite teas!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite teas. The flavor, taste and smells from this are amazing. Not sure how much stress relief this provides but it helps you start to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. I appreciate a tea that doesn’t need to be sweetened. This is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: HelloHappyOne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tea. I thought I wouldn’t like the flavor at first but I love it! I typically need to add at least two tablespoons of honey to any other tea, but I rarely add honey to this one. It tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: More Honey than Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice tea. Wish it was a bit more strong with lavender, but I do still like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dehne

customer_reviews.title: Taste is medicine-like
customer_reviews.text: If you like the taste of cold syrup medicine, then you would like this. I respect them for using organic and natural ingredients, but, wow, the taste is really medicine-like and strong. I really have to hold my nose in order to drink this.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Yummers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea, the only thing is that it leaves a slight filmy feeling in my mouth for a short while after I drink it. But it tastes very good especially with a little honey added in.
customer_reviews.author: tigressa13

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my sister for her birthday. Great price and packaging. Item cam as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Waters

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine free
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavor. I did feel relaxed before bedtime after drinking it. The fact that there is no caffeine helps;)
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Smooth delicate taste
customer_reviews.text: I particularly enjoy this tea. It has a smooth delicate taste and I've found it doesn't even need sugar to be added to be enjoyable. It is very nice to sit down and relax with a nice hot cup.
customer_reviews.author: Book Elf

customer_reviews.title: Review for the Yogi Honey Lavender Stress Tea
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful at bedtime, bath time, or even in the middle of a stressful day. Just the fragrance itself is calming and pleasant
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea! An excellent fresh, tasty flavor. Quality is excellent. My new favorite tea. Excellent fresh brewed with nothing added.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This tea smells and tastes amazing. Definitely helps relax and de-stress. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aunt who get stressed out a lot and in consequence gets anxiety attacks, since she started drinking it she has been more relaxed and hasn't gotten any anxiety attacks either.
customer_reviews.author: elvia

customer_reviews.title: I like lavender better when it's in my soap not my ...
customer_reviews.text: It tastes a bit too bitter for me, and strangely, I like lavender better when it's in my soap not my tea. Also, I can't feel any "stress relief" effect. Anyway, I think it depends on each person taste. Give it a try if you love lavender.
customer_reviews.author: P P N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tea for the occasions I feel like something fragrant but still with some body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes nice. Sitting down with a cup of tea is always calming. Trying to make this a habit every night.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Removed dark circles and bags from under my eyes and got rid of my stye
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get the tea to drink. I got it for the bags under my eyes. Now I wake up without them. I didn’t know tea could work so well. I’ve used creams and serums and not results. I wish I knew this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: REGINA

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tea is not my favorite but this tastes pretty good and it does help to calm me down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Catharine

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This tea has a pleasing aroma and taste and goes down smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Not Brainwashed

customer_reviews.title: This is just an amazing tea, unique flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is just an amazing tea, unique flavor, slight hint of vanilla. It's great for an evening tea or just to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Calajane

customer_reviews.title: Stress Relief
customer_reviews.text: Yogi has made a wonderful tea here. I was skeptical of the lavender because I am not a fan of the smell, but the tea does not have an overpowering aroma of lavender. Very soothing after a rough day and helps me relax get to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel any difference in using this tea. The taste was nothing special either. I felt the need to add honey still.
customer_reviews.author: pt24

customer_reviews.title: I really love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tea! It is perfect to drink just before bed to send you to lala land. Has a bit of stevia in it so it's sweeter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Coloring Book AddictTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love the name brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand and the flavor but a bit on the expensive side

customer_reviews.title: Best tea ever.
customer_reviews.text: Drinking this tea is like drinking a hug. It is great at any time of the day to help mellow you out/

customer_reviews.text: This tea tastes really good, has a light flavor and is really relaxing. Also great to use each tea bag for 2 cups!

product_meta.title: Yogi Tea Herbal Stress Relief, Honey Lavender 16 ct
product_meta.description: Size:16 Count (Pack of 1)Relax and breathe in the enchanting aroma of Yogi Honey Lavender Stress Relief tea. Made with herbs traditionally used for relaxation including Lavender, Chamomile and Lemon Balm; Yogi Honey Lavender Stress Relief tea is a soothing blend that helps your body and mind to unwind. These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: FLAVOR: Yogi Honey Lavender Stress Relief tea combines Lavender, Chamomile and Lemon Balm with Organic Honey Flavor for a floral and lightly citrus-y sweet blend.
BENEFITS: This soothing blend includes Lavender, Chamomile and Lemon Balm; herbs traditionally used to support relaxation.
ORGANIC: USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified.
CONTENTS: Caffeine free, Vegan, Kosher, Gluten free, No Artificial Flavors or Sweeteners and individually packaged in compostable tea bags.
BREWING SUGGESTIONS: To get the most out of every cup, bring water to boiling and steep 7 minutes. For a stronger tea, use 2 tea bags.
Relax and enjoy this delicious blend specifically formulated to help calm your mind and body
Lemon balm leaf and passion flower extract are used to promote relaxation by soothing the nerves
Organic chamomile and lavender comfort for a deliciously intriguing blend that promotes a sense of calm
Honey and spearmint help calm during a stressful day or to ease you into a restful night
100% all natural herbal supplement made with non-GMO ingredients
